_label: Intensive Israeli Bombing of West Beirut: One of the most violent aerial bombardments since the beginning of the war triggered by the Israelis in Lebanon took place in West Beirut, aiming chiefly at the Sabra and Hya Salam quarters. It is said that there were 250 dead and 400 wounded during the night of July 27 to 28, and during the day of 29th
